name: Girishas IT Solutions LLP
description:
Girishas IT Solutions LLP is a small group of passionate and enthusiastic individuals. We founded this company in May 2012, and we are masters in our specific technology fields. We're always on our toes until we've delivered your project to you.
Our expertise includes PHP, HTML, CSS, Javascript, AJAX, Flash, Flex, MySQL, Prototype, jQuery and other web programming technologies and platforms. We have been listed on Upwork for the last few years, and during this time, we have undertaken and successfully completed numerous projects including: implementing UI mockup & template, developing custom code, and ensuring mobile and responsive functions in MVC based frameworks like Cakephp/CI/Laravel/YII.
As a growing IT company, we understand the importance of our clientele base and that’s the only thing we are trying to earn! We welcome you.
